mapper.select: select to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') as chk_tm , a.spot_equip_no , max(coalesce (meas_val12,0) - c.max_flow )as max_flow --배합유량 , round(avg(coalesce (meas_val12,0) - c.avg_flow )) as avg_flow --배합유량 , min(coalesce (meas_val12,0) - c.min_flow ) as min_flow --배합유량 from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no join ( select to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') as chk_tm , a.spot_equip_no , max(coalesce (meas_val12,0)) as max_flow --배합유량 , round(avg(coalesce (meas_val12,0))) as avg_flow --배합유량 , min(coalesce (meas_val12,0)) as min_flow --배합유량 from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') = ( select min(to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24')) from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo} ) and a.spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo} and round(coalesce(a.meas_val12,0)::numeric ,2) not in (0,-999) group by to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') , a.spot_equip_no having max(round(coalesce(a.meas_val12,0)::numeric ,2)) not in (0,-999) order by chk_tm ) c on 1=1 where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo} and round(coalesce(a.meas_val12,0)::numeric ,2) not in (0,-999) group by to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') , a.spot_equip_no having max(round(coalesce(a.meas_val12,0)::numeric ,2)) not in (0,-999) order by chk_tm

select to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') as chk_tm -- , a.spot_equip_no , max(coalesce (meas_val13,0)) as max_pwr --최대전력량 , round(avg(coalesce (meas_val12,0))) as avg_pwr --평균전력량 , min(coalesce (meas_val13,0)) as min_pwr --최소전력량 from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.spot_equip_no between #{equipFr} and #{equipTo} --25~25:배합실, --26~30:충전실, 32~48:포장실 and round(coalesce(a.meas_val13,0)::numeric ,2) not in (0,-999) group by to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24') -- , a.spot_equip_no having max(round(coalesce(a.meas_val13,0)::numeric ,2)) not in (0,-999) order by chk_tm

select a.spot_equip_no , b.spot_no , c.spot_nm , max(round(meas_val::numeric,2)) as co2 , max(round(meas_val2::numeric ,2)) as tmpr , max(round(meas_val3::numeric ,2)) as humy from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') and b.spot_no in ( 1 , 2 , 3 ) group by a.spot_equip_no , b.spot_no , c.spot_nm order by spot_nm limit 10 offset 0

select a.spot_equip_no , max(round(coalesce (a.pass_qty,0),2)) as pass_qty -- 통과수량(정상수량) , max(round(coalesce (a.weight_qty,0),2)) as weight_qty -- 중량미달수량 , max(coalesce(d.indc_qty,0)) as indc_qty from oper_mast a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no join make_indc d on a.indc_no = d.indc_no and d.used_yn = 'Y' where a.spot_equip_no in (8, 10, 12, 14, 15, 16) and to_char(to_timestamp( a.fr_unix_hms), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by a.spot_equip_no

select a.spot_equip_no , b.spot_no , c.spot_nm , max(round(coalesce(meas_val,0)::numeric ,2)) as co2 --포장실 co2 , max(round(coalesce(meas_val2,0)::numeric ,2)) as temp -- 포장실 프리저온도, 포장실 온도 , max(round(coalesce(meas_val3,0)::numeric ,2)) as humy --포장실 습도 from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no where b.spot_equip_no in (2, 52) and to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') group by a.spot_equip_no , b.spot_no , c.spot_nm
